name: Fatman and Dancer
description:
Inspired to the 1966 TV episode "Hi Diddle Riddle" of Batman movie series.
Help Fatman (Batman) to pick up fat-discos and save the Dancer (Robin) .
Fight against Diddle Riddle and Joker.
Use ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE BAR for action.

The game ends when the Dancer falls down in the acid bin.
